original_title: Pilar de la autonomía y la vida de los partidistas
overview: In this generous film, the Zapatistas describe their ways of internal organization and operation, and they also share with us how the interaction with their neighbors who decided to stay under the blanket of the state works. Los Tercios Compas form an internal body to the EZLN that is dedicated to producing and communicating, representing themselves from autonomy.
title: Pilar de la autonomía y la vida de los partidistas
